def_en: The trimming on something such as a piece of clothing is the decoration, for example along its edges, that is in a different colour or material.

def_cn: (切取所需部分以后的)下脚料，剩余物
def_en: Trimmings are pieces of something, usually food, which are left over after you have cut what you need.

def_cn: 种种额外的东西;外加的种种配搭
def_en: If you say that something comes with all the trimmings, you mean that it has many extra things added to it to make it more special.
